creator: thomas2.maesing@bgs-ag.de
text:
Hi,
if only the AJP13 Connector is used, the redirect does not work correct (a 
MalformedURLException is thrown),
because java.protocol.handler.pkgs=com.sun.net.ssl.internal.www.protocol is not
set by the implementing class.
A workaround is to use the CATALINA_OPTS but in my opinion it should be done by 
the implementing class.

Best regards

Thomas

creator: cmanolache@yahoo.com
text:
I assume you are talking about a HTTPS site and a redirect. 

One problem is that we can't be sure that sun's jars are used. Some people
use Apache+SSL and tomcat without SSL. 

We need to find a better solution for that. Can you send a stack trace ?

Actually, you're right - for jdk1.3+ it should work. I'll add code to
initialize it for ajp ( if not already set ). Probably next release
will have it.
